that English is stress timed language
which means some syllables will be
longer stressed ones and some syllables
will be shorter unstressed ones compared
to syllable timed languages where each
syllable takes approximately the same
amount of time putting the stress in the
wrong place makes it difficult for a

let alone the whole sentence and it can
even change the meaning of the word
